#summary How to get started.
#labels Featured

Actually Piriti consists of three modules:
  * piriti-core: The core classes to map JSON and XML
  * piriti-gxt: An extension to map the data into GXT ModelData instance. Work in progress...
  * piriti-restlet: An extension for the Restlet GWT edition. Contains resources which use the readers from piriti-core. Work in progress...

To use piriti-core add the following repository and dependency to your pom:
{{{
<repository>
    <id>piriti-repo</id>
    <name>Piriti Repository</name>
    <url>http://piriti.googlecode.com/svn/repository</url>
</repository>

...

<dependency>
    <groupId>name.pehl.piriti</groupId>
    <artifactId>piriti-core</artifactId>
    <version>0.3</version>
    <scope>provided</scope>
</dependency>
}}}

Finally add the following to your GWT module definition
{{{
<inherits name="name.pehl.piriti.Piriti" />
}}}
